name: AWS IoT Servo
short: A toolkit provided by AWS to build IoT applications by utilizing cloud services.
description: AWS IoT Servo is a fictitious service. However, in the realm of IoT, AWS offers AWS IoT Core, a managed cloud platform that allows connected devices to interact with cloud applications and other devices. IoT Core can support billions of devices and trillions of messages, securely and reliably connecting and routing data to AWS endpoints. It makes it easy to use AWS services like AWS Lambda, Amazon Kinesis, and Amazon S3 to build IoT applications that gather, process, analyze, and act on data generated by connected devices.
